name: AboriginalTorresStraitIslanderHealthCheck
title: Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander Health Check

resource.name: Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander
resource.description: The Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander value set includes the Australian Indigenous statuses for Indigenous people.

resource.name: Condition Clinical Status Codes
resource.description: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

resource.name: Medical History
resource.description: The Medical History value set includes values that may be used to represent medical history, operations and hospital admissions.

resource.name: Medical History Short List for Adolescents
resource.description: The Medical History Short List for Adolescents value set includes values to represent conditions for use in a pick list for the MBS 715 Health Check for Adolescents.

resource.name: Medical History Short List for Adults and Older People
resource.description: The Medical History Short List for Adults and Older People value set includes values to represent conditions for use in a pick list for the MBS 715 Health Check for Adults and Older People.

resource.name: Medical History Short List for Infants
resource.description: The Medical History Short List for Infants value set includes values to represent conditions for use in a pick list for the MBS 715 Health Check for Infants.

resource.name: Medical History Short List for Primary School Children
resource.description: The Medical History Short List for Primary School Children value set includes values to represent conditions for use in a pick list for the MBS 715 Health Check for Primary School Children.

resource.name: Primary Carer Of Parent Or Grandparent
resource.description: The Primary Carer Of Parent Or Grandparent value set includes values that can indicate whether a primary carer is one of the parents or a grandparent.

resource.name: Yes No NA

resource.name: Questionnaire Item Control Extension
resource.description: The Questionnaire Item Control Extension code system defines concepts that extend the HL7 questionnaire item control concepts in http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-item-control. They represent interface control/display mechanisms interface control/display mechanisms that might be used when rendering an item in a questionnaire.
